item.title: Why Bitcoin Still Matters
item.description: Preliminary notes: Contact me- https://twitter.com/kanzure Why bitcoin still matters Hutchins, Founder of Silver Lake I hope in the coming days that the experts will critique me to help me learn more. I hope people from the general community, rather the experts pardon me, what I have an initial hypothesis regarding what will help bitcoin reach its full potential for its extraordinary opportunity that I think it is. The title of my presentation was “Why bitcoin still matters”.
